spec_data.Name: lxappearance-obconf
spec_data.Description:
This plugin adds an additional tab called "Window Border" to LXAppearance.
It is only visible when the plugin is installed and Openbox is in use.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 03:43:03 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Plugin to configure Openbox inside LXAppearance
